metadata.description:
"Written by renowned comic writer and author of the Quarry Hard Case Crime novels, Max Allan Collins ('Road to Perdition', 'Batman', 'Action Comics Weekly') and illustrated by Szymon Kudranski ('Batman: Streets of Gotham', 'Spider-Man', 'Spawn').

Former U.S. Marine sniper Quarry has found a new vocation as a professional assassin. But when his latest contract turns out to be an old acquaintance from his military days, the fresh-faced hit man finds himself battling against his own conscience as secrets from the past start to reveal themselves.

First ever Quarry comic – companion to the acclaimed Cinemax TV series."
metadata.name: Quarry's War
